name: Sand to Surf
description:
Tassili, the cradle of mankind, and the powerful deity that resides there have been corrupted by a viscous blight. Mankind can no longer survive without the deity's life-giving energy. As the lone sand-surfer, brave the dangerous sands of the ancient desert to save the world from the blight.

Sand to Surf blends the tight traversal experience of extreme sports games with the engrossing exploration experience of adventure games. Reading the landscape will be critical as you navigate pathways, avoid the blight's attacks, perform tricks, and collect energy to keep your sand board powered.

Key Features

  • An engaging sand-surfing experience, which takes boarding beyond strictly downhill courses.
  • A large and beautiful desert hub world to surf which branches into tighter, more linear challenges.
  • Use the slopes of the landscape, your sandboard's boost capability, and special objects in the environment to increase and maintain your speed.
  • Fantastic creatures to encounter.
